data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Su-Hwan, Kim, Hyeong-Su, Park, Jong-Young (2015): A new species of torrent catfish, Liobagrus hyeongsanensis (Teleostei: Siluriformes: Amblycipitidae), from Korea. Zootaxa 4007 (1): 267-275, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4007.2.9
